## ğŸ™ Special Thanks

### SAIB Competition
Built for the [SAIB Competition](https://github.com/txpipe/saib) by TxPipe. Special thanks to the TxPipe team for creating Argus.Sync and making blockchain indexing accessible.

### Infrastructure Providers
- **[Demeter.run](https://demeter.run/)** - For providing UtxoRPC infrastructure
- **[Koios](https://koios.rest/)** - For free Cardano API access

### Open Source Projects
- **Argus.Sync** - [@txpipe](https://github.com/txpipe/argus)
- **Chrysalis** - CBOR serialization library
- **ASP.NET Core** - [@dotnet](https://github.com/dotnet/aspnetcore)
- **React** - [@facebook](https://github.com/facebook/react)
- **Tailwind CSS** - [@tailwindlabs](https://github.com/tailwindlabs/tailwindcss)
